name: Rave Maze
description:
You walk into a rave and your objective is to get to the front line as soon as possible. The party is full of people so you have to make your way through the crowd while dancing to the rythm of the music.
You can only move on the beat, so get your headset ready because its time to party!

Controls:

↑ ←↓ →  or WASD for moving

Z for zoom in/out

P to go back to the main menu

R to reset current level.

C to go to the previous level and V to go to the next one.

Note: This game was made in three weeks.
